characterDescription:
Vyre is the name given to Moash by Leshwi as she offers him a Blade, which he recognizes as the Honorblade of Jezerezeh, formerly in the possession of the Assassin in White. Leshwi warns him that if he takes it, he dies. That Moash will be no more. He takes the Blade by the hilt and becomes Vyre.
Khen then gives him a sphere and tells him that the name means "He Who Quiets." Vyre, He Who Quiets, sucks in the light of the sphere, then Lashes himself upward into the sky.

characterDetails.Appearance: Vyre dresses like a soldier, with perfectly trimmed hair, and a sharp uniform cut after human tailoring.
characterDetails.Characteristics: He is not the original Vyre, as this was El.
